packageName: Weather-Display With OWM-NWS Alerts Forecast Driver
author: Matthew Scott
releaseNotes: Restoring 'certainty' to the weather.gov alert poll.  The is a known issue with the weather.gov API right now.  See the community lik for more info.  PLEASE NOTE: after any update of the driver code, even if you use Hubitat Package Manager, you should open the virtual device, click 'Save Device', then click 'Save Preferences'.

drivers.name: Weather-Display With OWM-NWS Alerts Forecast Driver
